version_description: Blued international version introduces simplified features and bug fixes.
Blued international version introduces simplified features and bug fixes.
Blued international version introduces simplified features and bug fixes.

- New registration process.
- Introducing recommended user algorithm to ensure better suggestions.
- Increased support for non-English usernames.（Now support English, Thai, Spanish , Korean and French）

In this version, we're excited to introduce you a new section with spicy trending topics. A redesigned Nearby and Timeline interface. The simpler design puts the focus on your profile photos and posts.

- New trending topic section;
- Redesigned timeline interface, cleaner posts display strategy;
- Nearby interface optimization. Go find intersting guys and groups!
- Come interact with popular Blued Stars! 
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

 Love, The Blued Team.

"In this version, we're excited to introduce our brand new Blued LIVE! 
Come become popular, earn rewards by broadcasting to world's largest gay community!
Going LIVE will instantly notify your followers who can join, comment and send presents!

- Registration process optimisation; 
- Giving feedback has never been easier (Me - Feedback) ;
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you for using Blued :)
If you encounter any issue or require further assistance , contact us at support@blued.com
Or find us on Twitter: @Blued , Facebook: @Blued. We'll look into it thoroughly. "

We are excited to present you Blued 1.6.0 ! In this version，
- New phone call verification added for registration. You’ll never miss the code any more. 
- Brand new chatting interface, simpler and cleaner than ever.
- Overhaul of live broadcasting interface. Interacting has never been easier.
- New algorithm for broadcasting sorting. now clever enough to present channels you may like!
- Post translation support. Communicate to guys all over the globe!
- Fix the bug which influence login via Facebook.
- Popular guys recommendation, in trending timeline feed.

For troubleshooting and issues, contact support@blued.com
Or join ‘Blued Support’ group (search by ID: 10000) in app
Find us on Twitter: @Blued
And Facebook: @BluedApp

Blued 1.7 updated!
With a bunch of fresh features and improvements!
- Instantly get notified whenever your favorite hosts go live even within the app! 
- Simplified&shortened registration process.
- Richer contents displayed, smarter recommendation algorithm, helping you to find adorable guys. 
- Fully support voice-call verification, you won't miss a code any more. 
- Identifying new guys and hosts nearby has never been easier.
- On-boarding tips on major interfaces for newcomers to quickly master the app!

Overhauled live experience, Big upgrade, Significant improvements!
Minimized window mode enable you to surf across the app while still watching live!
View their profile page directly during live session!
Broadcasters now can invite any viewer to join the live with him together!
Landscape mode enables various screen proportion.

Blued 2.0 (beta) — The beginning of a new chapter for gay social.

Awesome social features.
-    Message request! New message requests are now separate from your existing convos in your inbox.
-    New browse look! See profiles by distance, trending, newly joined, and online status all in one place.
-    Group discovery! Improved discovery feature helps you find groups based on interest.
-    Improvements! General performance and stability improvements, especially for live and messaging.

Check it out now. There’s more to come...

- Optimized registration process! We adopted Account Kit provided by Facebook. Signing up Blued has never been this easier and faster!
- Share your Photo Lab results with screenshot to your Facebook and Twitter friends!
- New layout for live streams. See more channels in one glimpse!
- FYI, e-mail registration is temporarily not available. But don’t worry you still can log in with your previously registered e-mail address!

Introducing Blued 2.1:
Heaps of content flying your way, richer than ever before, and even faster and easier to share on Blued!
- Who likes scary URLs? Blued now supports rich weblink sharing, both on your timeline and in your private conversations.
- And who doesn't like funny GIFs? We’re excited to introduce GIFs to Blued! What an exciting way to liven up your interactions!
- Ever come across something you’d like to share with your Blued friends? Tap and hold content to be able to forward it to them!
- Don’t like being relentlessly recommended the same guy? Exclude those persistent ones… if you must and Blued won’t suggest them to you ever again (we promise).
- A new, clearer feel to profile info for you, and for everyone in the Blued community!
- We’d love to be perfect and we’d like to think we’re getting better, but truth is, there’s always room for improvement, so like always, this update also includes some bug fixes.

- And who doesn't like funny GIFs? We’re excited to introduce GIFs to Blued! What an exciting way to liven up your interactions!
- Ever come across something you’d like to share with your Blued friends? Tap and hold content to be able to forward it to them!
- Don’t like being relentlessly recommended the same guy? Exclude those persistent ones… if you must and Blued won’t suggest them to you ever again (we promise).
- A new, clearer feel to profile info for you, and for everyone in the Blued community!
- We’d love to be perfect and we’d like to think we’re getting better, but truth is, there’s always room for improvement, so like always, this update also includes some bug fixes.

Introducing Blued 2.2
- Brand new ‘Explore’ channel. Now Blued becomes even smarter to present you what you’re interested in.
- Notification Center. Check the activity that matters to you, all in one place. You won’t miss anyone any more.
- Express emotions with huuuuge emojis! Language barrier is a thing of the past!
- Invite friends to join Blued and both of you will obtain generous rewards!
- Completely redesigned “settings” page. Makes finding preferences easier than ever.
- General performance and stability improvements.

Introducing Blued Pride Special Edition!
** Account Deletion ** 
We’re sad to see you go, but from now on every Blued user gets the complete freedom to delete their own account. Joining or leaving, we believe the choice is all yours and this time we’ve made it easier than ever.
** Hashtag Overhaul ** 
Brand new hashtag exploration. Find interesting posts in a glance.
** UX/UI Improvements **
The whole visual interface has been scrutinised. More than 100 UI improvements. In a nutshell, Blued has become more beautiful.

Here comes our latest big update with significant improvements. Socializing in Blued becomes more versatile and convenient than ever.
- Completely overhauled posting experience.
Insert photos, videos, location tags, hashtags, web links, mention anyone, whatever you like, all in one place.
- Streamlined video creation process.
Prolonged video length and a bunch of wonderful real-time filters as well as facial beautification tools added.
- Dive into bustling group chats.
Groups in Blued now can be browsed by categories. Finding interesting groups or creating your own has never been easier.
- Popup notifications at a glance.
Never miss a single greeting.
- Sending video files and multiple photos at one time.
Even allow you to edit directly within Blued.
- Hierarchical rewards for frequent broadcasters.
Full of privileges and rewards prepared, in a word, broadcast more!
- Forward timeline posts to chat.
- Share Live stream and posts to your friends on Whatsapp, Line and Messager.
And there's so much more. Update to check them out now.

- Private Photos: added privacy and security by allowing you to restrict access to some of your photos  
- Private Live: Want to do Live broadcasts exclusively for people you invite? That's now possible with our Private Live feature!
- Improved design.
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Compatible optimisations for iOS 11.
